'''A Thousand Petals of Red Glaze''' is a purchasable [[Furnishing]]. It can be purchased from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=80}}.

Interacting with A Thousand Petals of Red Glaze will cause flowers to sparkle and petals to burst forth.
